NimMainFiles

Class Nim

  • java.lang.Object
    • NimMainFiles.Nim

  • public class Nim
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that simulates a Nim game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Nim(Player[] myPlayers)
      Create a Nim game with a pile and all the players.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean gameOver(boolean isOver)
      Determines whether or not the game is over.
      java.lang.String play()
      Plays the game of Nim.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Nim

        public Nim(Player[] myPlayers)
        Create a Nim game with a pile and all the players.
        Parameters:
        myPlayers - the list of the players playing the game. Either smart computer vs human or dumb computer vs human

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public java.lang.String play()
        Plays the game of Nim. Each player takes turns removing marbles from the pile. Prints out the number of marbles each player removed after each turn.
        Returns:
        who the winner is

      • gameOver

        public boolean gameOver(boolean isOver)
        Determines whether or not the game is over.
        Parameters:
        isOver - whether or not the game is over. If isOver is true then game is over
        Returns:
        whether or not the game is over
